document.full_text: a new york man has been arrested for allegedly selling illegal prescription drugs from his ice cream truck, making more than $1 million in a year, prosecutors said on thursday.
document.title: ny drug ring accused of dealing from ice cream truck
lines_and_colors: a new york man has been arrested for allegedly selling illegal prescription drugs from his ice cream truck, making more than $1 million in a year, prosecutors said on thursday.
